participant_1.background:
I m currently in nursing school.
My mother was a sunday school teacher.
I dance ballet.
I am an only child.

participant_2.background:
I m allergic to shellfish.
My favorite food is cheese.
I like horseback riding.
I work at a non profit that helps children.

content.text: Hi there! I'm [user 1's name], what's your name?
It's nice to meet you, [user 2's name]. What do you do for a living?
I work at a non-profit that helps children.
That's great! I'm sure you're doing a lot of good work.
Thanks, I try! What about you, what do you do?
Oh, that's awesome! I've always thought about going into nursing, but I'm not sure I have the stomach for it.
It can be tough, but it's also very rewarding. I love the feeling of helping people.
I can imagine. What's your favorite thing about nursing school?
I love learning about the human body and how to care for people. It's really interesting.
That makes sense. I love learning about the human body too. I have a lot of family members who are nurses, and they've all told me it's a great job.
I think so too! It's a lot of hard work, but it's worth it.
I'm sure it is. So, what do you want to do after you graduate from nursing school?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about working in a hospital, but I'm also considering going into private practice.
Both of those sound like great options. I'm sure you'll find something you love.
